item.text: DAO is a Distributed Appication which purpose is a governance of the organisation or a system.
It can be compared to a constitution written in programming language. The concept is quite complex and can be discussde from both philiosophical and abstract and practical perspectives.
Philosophically topic of DAO relates to the mechanisms of power.
It can be compared to a constitution written in programming language. The concept is quite complex and can be discussed on both philiosophical and abstract and practical levels.
